```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r , warning = F, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)

# read data 
df_tool_data <- readxl::read_excel("inputs/UGA2103_Financial_Service_Providers_Assessment_HH_Tool_June2021.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(uuid = `_uuid`,
         start_date = as_date(start),
         start = as_datetime(start),
         end = as_datetime(end)) %>% 
  filter(consent == "yes", start_date > as_date("2021-08-29"), point_number != "13m." )

df_cl_log <- read_csv(file = "inputs/combined_logic_spatial_and_others_checks.csv")

df_cl_log_reviewed

```

There are **`r nrow(df_tool_data)`** total number of surveys done todate **`r Sys.time()`**. With **`r nrow(df_tool_data$status == "refugee")`** surveys done in settlements and **`r nrow(df_tool_data$status == "host_community")`** surveys done in host community.
